name: Dangerous Hobby
description:
"Dangerous Hobby" is a classic side-scrolling 2D platformer game, the goal of which is to overcome obstacles to complete levels of varying difficulty. Spikes, saws, flying projectiles, moving platforms and much more await to finish you off.

You are an adventurer treasure hunter who wants is to collect gems and survive.

Game Features:
  • Nice pixel graphics
  • Hardcore gameplay
  • Steam Achievements support
  • 3 worlds, 60 levels
